Mild Zinc Plated Full Extension Super Heavy Duty Slide DZ4180-080-035-U
description: Zinc-plated super heavy duty slide DZ4180-080-035-U, in a slide length of up to 2000mm and a slide profile height of 80mm Accuride stock an impressive range of heavy duty products, however the super heavy duty DZ4180-080-035-U telescopic slide has taken this range to the next level. Designed with an I-beam intermediate member for extra strength, the DZ4180-080-035-U telescopic slide is able to support up to 980kg, even when at full extension. If you are looking for a heavy duty slide which can support weights of up to 980kg whilst maintaining a smooth and stable movement, then this is the slide for you. It is common within the industry to use mild steel balls with a diameter of 8mm or less. However, to achieve a smooth and controlled slide movement whilst still supporting such a large weight, the DZ4180-080-035-U uses stainless steel ball with a diameter of 10mm. Threaded mounting holes also allow for additional stability and simple mounting using the customers’ preferred bolt type. The mild zinc plated slide has an 80mm profile height and can be ordered in a range of lengths of up to 2000mm, and can function in temperatures between -20°C to +110°C. This, along with the ability to support such an impressive weight, makes the mild zinc-plated slide suitable for use in a range of mobile and stationary applications from industrial storage to automation and robotics. The full extension feature makes the product especially well suited to supporting subunits like chillers, filters or motors as it allows for full and easy access to the back of the compartment for easy maintenance or cleaning. The slide is not limited to battery compartments in railways and electric cars or unloading ammunition in military vehicles. The slide can also help to position heavy components precisely for picking and handling by robots in smart factories. Customisation The impressive 4180-080-035-U series is available in either zinc or stainless steel finishes, and can be customised to fit your requirements, with a range of extension options and slide lengths of up to 2000mm possible. Our technical consulting ability means that our experienced team of engineers can work directly with you to customize the product to your needs. If you are interested in a customized version of the super heavy duty DZ4180-080-035-U slide contact us directly.
features: Super heavy duty slide with a load rating of up to 980kg 100% extension, allowing for easy access to the back of storage compartments 10mm ball bearing diameter for smooth running and stability, compared to the industry standard of 8mm Double-T intermediate member for extra strength Threaded mounting holes for additional stability Flat mounting not recommended, for queries speak to tech support Corrosion resistant zinc plated finish, subject to 12 hours salt spray testing Designed for a range of mobile and stationary applications: battery tray access for electric, emergency services, military and mining vehiceles automation and robotics industrial storage

name: Linear Motion System DA0118RC
description: The linear motion system DA0118RC: Accuride’s medium duty linear guide solution The DA0118RC linear motion system is designed to support weights of up to 375kg, with a push force which can be as low as just 2% of the application’s weight. This innovative design brings Accuride’s linear motion track range to the forefront of the market. As the medium duty component of the range, the DA0118RC linear guide provides smooth movement to vending machines, pull-out worktops and assembly lines. If you need a stylish way to maximise kitchen worktop space or a sliding door which requires little effort to be opened, then the DA0118RC linear motion track is the right product. However, for cabinet hardware applications with a load rating of less than 100kg we would recommend our DA0115-RC linear guide. For larger industrial applications of up to 600kg, take a look at our DA0116RC linear guide. Designed for space restricted applications The compact design of the linear motion guide means that the product is perfect for applications where space is restricted. This makes our linear motion guide the preferable option compared to rollers, which are large and harder to move. Architectural sliding doors Designed with sliding doors in mind, the DA0118RC linear motion guide has a compact design and a safety feature which ensures that even when too much load is applied, the carriage will remain securely within the track, removing the risk of the door collapsing. The slide’s low push force makes it particularly easy to move doors of up to 375kg, therefore meeting important industry standards like BS EN 1527. Essential Components For the DA0118RC linear motion guide to function properly it is essential to purchase at least one aluminium linear motion track, an end stop kit (or two dampers) and a recirculating ball bearing carriage (each sold separately). Aluminium Linear Track Sold in lengths of 2.4m, with the option for the customer to cut the track to the required length or ‘butt’ multiple tracks together. DA0118-0240RCH track, with pre-drilled fixing holes. DA0118-0240RC track comes with no pre-drilled fixing holes, customer to drill holes. Custom lengths of up to 4m are available upon request. End Stop kit To be screwed into the end of the linear track, to stop the travel of the recirculating ball bearing carriage. Recirculating Ball Bearing Carriages Two variations available: Stainless Steel Balls Carriage (DS0118-CASSRC), for higher load ratings. Polymer Balls Carriage (DP0118-CASSRC) has a quieter movement and requires less frequent lubrication. The amount of carriages required will depend on your application’s load rating, refer to the datasheet for more information. Linear Guide Accessories Depending on the application, we would recommend the following accessories: Damper mechanism There is the option to replace the end stop with a damper mechanism, which cushions the last 40mm of travel. This must be used with either a recycling bracket or door mounting bracket to reset the damper each cycle. Sliding Door Hardware Kit The product’s compact size, low push force and safety feature make the DA0118RC linear motion guide especially well suited to the sliding door market. A door mounting bracket is required for sliding door hardware. For bi-fold doors, please contact us for more information.
features: Compact design, making the linear guide suitable for space-restricted applications. Metal on metal overlap safety feature makes it a much sturdier and safer option compared to other sliding door hardware, ensuring that the carriage remains securely in place even when too much weight is applied, reducing the risk of the door collapsing. Made of non-magnetic materials, making the product suitable for medical or military applications. Excellent corrosion resistance, DP0118-CASSRC subject to 500 hours salt spray testing Infinite track lengths possible, customer is able to cut track to length or butt tracks together end to end. Custom track lengths of up to 4m are available upon request. Suitable for a range of industries and applications, for example vending machines, sliding architectural doors, extendable worktops and assembly lines.

name: Linear Motion Track 2.4m without Fixing Holes DA0118-0240RC
description: Linear motion track 2.4m without fixing holes DA0118-0240RC, for use with the linear motion guide DA0118RC When suitably fixed and supported, the track is designed to carry up to 375kg, making it suitable for a range of movement applications like sliding doors, extendable worktops, and assembly lines. Track Length The track is available to order in a length of 2.4m, however the customer can then cut the track to length or butt multiple tracks together end to end, making it possible to change the track length to suit a project’s requirements. Custom lengths of up to 4m are also available upon request. Fixing Holes The track comes with no pre-drilled fixing holes. For a track with fixing holes refer to our DA0118-0240RCH linear motion track, which comes with 20 pre-drilled fixing holes. A key component for the DA0118RC linear motion guide Designed as a part of our DA0118RC linear motion guide, the track should be purchased with a range of components depending on the type of linear motion application. Basic requirement for all linear motion applications The track requires a minimum of one recirculating ball carriage with either stainless steel or polymer balls. The linear track should be purchased with either DA0118-STOPRC end stops or the DP0118-ECRC damper mechanism and DS0118-BRKTRC recycling bracket. For sliding doors If used for sliding doors, the track will need to be purchased with at least two recirculating ball carriages and DS0118-SMBRKTRC door mounting brackets. For more information on the components required, refer to the product datasheet. Installation We recommend that the track is fixed onto a rigid and flat surface, with fixings spaced no further apart than 120 mm. To fix the track to the supporting surface we recommend using M5 counter screws, with a minimum thread length of 10mm. For more information refer to the product installation guide. For further information on installation refer to the installation guide.
features: Light-weight, corrosion-resistant aluminium material No pre-drilled fixing holes, giving the customer the option to drill their own fixing holes Carriages sold separately, available with either stainless steel (for higher load ratings) or polymer ball bearings (for quieter movement). Infinite track lengths possible, the customer can either cut track to length or butt multiple tracks together.

name: Linear Motion Track 2.4m with Fixing Holes DA0118-0240RCH
description: Linear Motion Track 2.4m with 20 pre-drilled fixing holes DA0118-0240RCH, for use with the DA0118RC linear motion guide The lightweight, corrosion resistant track is resistant to dust and dirt, making it suitable for a range of movement applications like sliding doors, extendable worktops and assembly lines. The track is available to order in a length of 2.4m, however the customer can then cut the track to length or butt multiple tracks together end to end, making it possible to change the track length to suit a project’s requirements. Custom lengths of up to 4m are also available upon request. For ease of installation, the track comes with 20 pre-drilled fixing holes. Designed as a part of our DA0118RC linear motion guide, the track requires a minimum of one recirculating ball carriage with either stainless steel or polymer balls. Overall, the DA0118RC linear motion system is capable of supporting up to 375kg. The linear track should be purchased with either DA0118-STOPRC end stops or DP0118-ECRC damper mechanism and DS0118-BRKTRC recycling bracket. If used for sliding doors, the track will need to be purchased with at least two DS0118-SMBRKTRC door mounting brackets. For further information refer to the product datasheet or contact us directly.
features: Light-weight, corrosion-resistant aluminium material Carriages sold separately, available with either stainless steel (for higher load ratings) or polymer ball bearings (for quieter movement). Infinite track lengths possible, the customer can either cut track to length or butt multiple tracks together.

name: End Stop Kit DA0118-STOPRC For Linear Slides
description: End Stop Kit DA0118-STOPRC For Linear Slides use with linear motion guide DA0118RC, to securely stop the travel of the carriage The DA0118-STOPRC end stop kit is designed for use with our DA0118RC linear track, the end stops act as a barrier to stop the carriage from continuing off the end of the track. Each purchase will include two aluminium end stops and two installation screws, however fixing screws will need to be sourced by the customer. Each end stop comes with three holes pre-drilled into the surface. Installation To ensure secure installation, the end stops should be fixed securely into the linear track using the provided installation screws and then the track should then be fixed to the supporting surface using fixing screws, which the customer can purchase from most hardware stores. Product configurations This is an essential component for the DA0118RC linear motion guide and should be purchased with at least one aluminium track and one ball carriage. Although it is not essential, a recycling bracket is a useful way to protect the carriage from any ware and tear which may occur from constant contact with the end stop. The DS0118-BRKTRC recycling bracket must be purchased separately. It is also possible to replace the use of end stops with our DP0118-ECRC damper mechanism. This is ideal for applications which require the linear motion guide to open and close softly, for example in sliding architectural doors or sliding worktops. A DS0118-BRKTRC recycling bracket is also needed to reset the damper. For more information, take a look at our DP0118-ECRC damper. Please refer to the product datasheet and installation guide for further information.
features: End stop kit containing 2x ends stops & 2x installation screws. Fixing screws must be provided by the customer. Each end stop comes with three holes pre-drilled into the surface.

name: Damper Mechanism DP0118-ECRC
description: Damper mechanism DP0118-ECRC: designed to decelerate and cushion the last 40mm of slide travel Damper mechanism DP0118-ECRC slows down the last 40mm of slide travel and ensures that the linear motion guide slows to a stop softly. This makes the DP0118-ECRC damper mechanism a popular accessory for our DA0118RC linear motion track and ball carriage, especially for applications like sliding architectural doors or extendable worktops. The damper mechanism not only cushions the closing of the application but it also makes it impossible to slam the application shut, therefore protecting the sliding door or worktop from potential damage. Suitable for medium duty applications of up to 375kg, however we recommend using additional external stopping arrangements when used with high impact applications. The damper mechanism will replace the need for end stops, and must be used with either a recycling bracket or a door mounting bracket to reset the damper mechanism after each use. For secure installation, we recommend drilling through the track and securing the damper to the supporting surface. For more information, refer to the product datasheet or installation guide.
features: Damper mechanism, used to dampen and cushion the last 40mm of slide travel. Makes it impossible to slam the application shut, therefore minimising the risk of any potential damage Must be used with either a recycling bracket or door mounting bracket to reset the damper. Replaces the need for end stops. Suitable for use in any orientation. Suitable for domestic or commercial applications, like sliding doors or worktops.

name: Recirculating Ball Carriage (Polymer Balls) DP0118-CASSRC
description: Recirculating ball carriage DP0118-CASSRC, with polymer ball bearings for quiet and smooth movement The recirculating ball carriage DP0118-CASSRC is designed with polymer ball bearings for quiet and smooth movement. Perfect for noise-sensitive environments Designed for use with our DA0118RC linear motion solution, the recirculating ball carriage uses polymer ball bearings to ensure that the application moves quietly along the track. The use of polymer ball bearings, instead of stainless steel, gives the cassette its quiet and smooth movement and ensures it requires little maintenance. The recirculating ball carriage DP0118-CASSRC can support up to 250kg, making it a popular choice for hospital sliding doors or extendable marble kitchen countertops. Recirculating ball carriage DS0118-CASSRC (stainless steel balls) However, for industrial or commercial environments where quiet movement is not a priority, we would instead recommend using the DS0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage. This recirculating ball carriage instead uses stainless steel balls to provide enhanced stability for heavy-duty sliding applications. For more information on the recommended weight requirements for the DS0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage (stainless steel balls) compared to the DP0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage (polymer balls) see the diagram below: Image The number of carriages needed per track will vary depending on the application and load, please refer to the product datasheet for more information. Multiple carriages increase the stability and load capacity of the linear guide. Improved Hygiene Unlike the exposed ball retainer found in a traditional ‘non-recirculating’ linear slide, the use of a linear track and recirculating ball carriage is much less likely to trap dirt and dust. This makes the DA0118RC linear motion system easier to clean and better suited to industries where hygiene is important, like the medical or food industries.
features: Polymer balls for quieter movement and less frequent lubrication For sound-sensitive environments where the linear motion application needs to move quietly, for example hospital sliding doors or extendable marble kitchen countertops. Also, for higher loads of up to 375kg, see the DS0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage with stainless steel balls

name: Recycling Bracket DS0118-BRKTRC Resets Damper Mechanism
description: Recycling bracket DS0118-BRKTRC use with DA0118RC linear guide, to protect the carriage from contact with end stops and/or to reset the damper mechanism The stainless steel bracket has two main functions: Protecting the carriage The recycling bracket can act as a protective barrier for the carriage, protecting it from any wear and tear that may occur from constant impact with the end stops. This is particularly useful for linear motion applications that require frequent use or which may be subject to abuse loads. Resetting the damper mechanism Using the DP0118-ECRC damper mechanism (which will replace the need for end stops) is a popular choice for domestic applications like sliding doors or extendable worktops, where it is important that the application opens and closes slowly. This stops the linear motion application from slamming shut because the damper mechanism will slow it down for the last 40mm of travel. The recycling bracket is used to reset the damper mechanism each time the cassette meets the damper, making it an essential component when using a damper mechanism.
features: The bracket is made of a corrosion-resistant stainless steel material, making it suitable for outdoor applications if required Product fixings not included Suitable for linear motion applications weighing up to 375kg, from sliding kitchen worktops to sliding doors.

name: Recirculating Ball Carriage (Stainless Steel Balls) DS0118-CASSRC
description: Recirculating ball carriage with stainless steel balls: suitable for linear motion applications of up to 375kg Stainless steel ball bearings are much stronger than polymer ball bearings, therefore we recommend using the DS0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage for linear motion applications of up to 375kg. A quieter alternative: the recirculating ball carriage DP0118-CASSRC (polymer balls) However, for a quieter alternative, take a look at the DP0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage, with polymer balls. The recirculating ball carriage DP0118-CASSRC uses polymer ball bearings for a smoother and quieter movement and less frequent lubrication. Refer to the table for the recommended load ratings for carriages using polymer balls (DP0118-CASSRC) compared to stainless steel balls (DS0118-CASSRC): Image How many carriages are required per a linear track? Multiple carriages increase the stability and load capacity of the linear guide, please refer to the product datasheet for more information. Installation We recommend using M5 screws, with a minimum thread length of 10mm to fix the carriage.
features: Stainless steel balls provide reliable movement for heavy duty applications of up to 375kg Suitable for linear motion applications like sliding doors, extendable worktops and assembly line applications Also, for quieter movement and less frequent lubrication, see the DP0118-CASSRC recirculating ball carriage with polymer balls

name: Mounting Bracket for Doors DS0118-SMBRKTRC
description: Mounting Bracket for Doors DS0118-SMBRKTRC use with linear motion track and carriage DA0118RC The DA0118RC linear motion track and carriage has been designed specifically for sliding architectural doors, however for the product to be suitable for sliding door applications it is essential that the DS0118-SMBRKTRC door mounting bracket is also used. The DS0118-SMBRKTRC Door Mounting Bracket The DS0118-SMBRKTRC door bracket has been designed for easy installation and maintenance, with the pivoting self-levelling system and lateral and height adjustment feature providing a simple way to align the door during installation. Access holes have also been designed into the bracket so that the carriage can be re-greased whilst it is in use. To ensure stability, two carriages should be used per a door and the door’s weight should be evenly distributed between these two carriages. Then, when fixing the door to the door mounting bracket, the bracket must align with the centre of the door thickness. For more information on the installation of the product, refer to the installation guide. Why use the DA0116RC linear motion guide for sliding door applications? The DA0118RC linear guide provides smooth and effortless movement to top hung sliding doors, making it the best choice when it comes to finding the right sliding door hardware for your project. Not only can it support doors of up to 375kg, with a push force of just 2% of the application’s weight, but the linear guide also has a safety feature that ensures that if too much force is applied and the carriage breaks, the door will remain firmly in place, removing the risk of the door collapsing on anyone. For larger sliding doors see our DA0116RC linear guide, which is suitable for sliding doors weighing up to 600kg. The DA0118RC components required for sliding door applications: DS0118-SMBRKTRC door mounting bracket Linear track At least two carriages (using either stainless steel or polymer balls) Either end stops or a damper mechanism: End stop kit Damper mechanism (which will cushion and dampen the last 40mm of slide travel, replacing the need for end stops) Bi-Fold Doors The DS0118-SMBRKTRC door bracket is only compatible for sliding doors, if you are interested in a bracket for bi-fold doors please contact us directly and a member of our team will be happy to help.
features: Height and lateral adjustments to aid alignment during installation Pivoting self-levelling mechanism to aid door alignment during installation The bracket is not suitable for flat mounting, it is suitable for side mounting only. Can be used with optional DP0118-ECRC damper to decelerate the door The bracket is corrosion resistant, making it suitable for exterior use when used with suitable protection

name: Pocket Door Pack for Large Door DA1532-0065-P1-SI
description: The DA1532-0065-P1-SI pocket door slide: Accuride’s answer to heavy-duty wardrobes and cabinets As the recommended pocket door slide for doors of up to 9kg, the DA1532-0065-P1-SI pocket door system has been designed with large wardrobe doors and tall room dividers in mind. Easy to setup The DA1532 pocket door slide is quicker to install compared to other similar pocket door slides on the market due to there being fewer components and a simplified cable alignment. This therefore saves the fitter money by allowing them to complete the installation quickly and then move on to the next job. See the product installation guide for a step-by-step guide on how to install the product The option to cut the product to length Cut the linear track to the exact length of the cabinet, rather than compromising to standard stock lengths. This allows you to maximise the door travel to fit your cabinet depth. Easier to clean Thanks to its recirculating ball cassettes, it is less likely to trap dirt and dust and can be wiped and regreased when required. This means that the DA1532 pocket door slide is more hygienic and well suited to the medical or food industries. Soft close hinge feature The integrated soft close hinge mechanism helps to reduce the impact and noise of the door closing, providing a quieter and more comfortable living space. Supporting high loads with smooth movement The recirculating linear guide system is designed for supporting high loads and the kits for tall doors contain a centre slide to avoid flexing of the door. Supporting high loads with smooth movement The recirculating linear guide system is designed for supporting high loads of up to 9kg. Configurating the DA1532 pocket door pack If you need a variation of our DA1532 pocket door slide for a different sized door, visit our product configurator to change your requirements. The DA1532 slide system is configured based on the size of the door. To find out which combination is suitable for your application, simply enter the cabinet depth, door height, door thickness and the fit of the door (inset or partial overlay) into the product configurator. This will then suggest the appropriate DA1532 kit for your application.
features: Not suitable for flat mounting Cable system for synchronised slide opening Simple installation due to fewer components and a simplified cable alignment process Due to the recirculating ball cassettes, it is less likely to trap dirt and dust and can be wiped and regreased when required Soft close hinge mechanism helps to reduce the impact and noise of the door closing

name: Stainless Steel Soft Close Slide for Wide Drawers DS5321-EC
description: The stainless steel easy close slide DS5321EC: for wide drawers of up to 1000 mm and loads of up to 100 kg The DS5321EC stainless steel easy-close slide is designed to support loads of up to 100 kg, making it suitable for a range of heavy-duty applications. The slide is made of corrosion resistant materials and can withstand temperatures of between 0 °C to 40 °C, making the slide especially well suited to professional kitchen and food service environments. Suitable for wide drawers Suitable for drawers up to 1000mm wide, this is a smooth piece of motion hardware for heavy-duty drawers, trays and shelves in commercial, industrial and residential spaces. Full extension slide for easy access The full 100% extension feature allows for easy access to the back of the drawer or application. Easy close feature The easy-close mechanism, also known as “soft-close”, has been engineered to be integrated into the slide for optimal function and design. This allows the slide to close slowly and softly, making it more pleasant for sound-sensitive environments such as hospitals and also safer for domestic applications such as kitchen drawers, as the smooth and soft closing minimizes the force of the drawer if fingers got trapped. An optional bracket accessory kit is available for various mounting options.
features: Easy close feature 100% full extension allows for easy access to the back of the drawer or application Corrosion resistant stainless steel material makes the slide suitable for applications like outdoor kitchens, laboratory equipment and medical equipment The temperature range of 0 °C to 40 °C, making the slide suitable for professional kitchen and food service environments Suitable for drawers up to 1000mm wide

Telescopic Stainless Steel Easy Close Slide DS5334EC
description: The DS5334EC Telescopic Slide – High-grade stainless-steel slide, with soft close and front disconnect features Designed for medium-duty applications, the Medium Duty Stainless Steel Easy Close Slide DS5334EC is a reliable and robust solution for your storage needs. Made from high-grade stainless steel, the corrosion resistant slide has been designed with a soft-close mechanism and a front disconnect feature, making it an ideal choice for applications within the medical, marine and food industries. The slide can be used at temperatures from 0°C to +40°C, which means that the soft close slide can be used in fridges and cold storage applications. Medium Duty Applications: Rigorously tested to twice its load capacity, the DS5334EC guarantees smooth and reliable movement. Having been tested to 80,000 cycles, the telescopic slide can support medium-duty applications weighing up to 90kg. Whether in industrial settings or residential spaces, rest assured that this slide can handle the demands of your storage requirements. High-Grade Stainless-Steel Material: The DS5334EC slide comes in a corrosion resistant AISI 304 (A2, 1.4301) stainless-steel material. This means that the slide is more hygienic and easier to clean, which makes it a popular choice for kitchen fittings, food industry, medical and hospital equipment. This also makes the DS5334EC telescopic slideideal for environments where mild steel might be subject to corrosion, for example in yachts. Easy Access with Full Extension: The full extension feature allows the user to reach the back of drawers or compartments effortlessly, enhancing convenience and practicality in your storage solutions. Soft Close Feature: The DS5334EC is designed for an enhanced user experience, featuring a soft-close mechanism for the last 45mm of the closing cycle. Enjoy smooth and quiet closure, minimizing noise and preventing abrupt slamming. The DS5334EC slide is one of the few slides with a soft close feature which can function in temperatures as low as 0°C, making this slide ideal for applications like fridges or cold rooms. Front Disconnect Feature: For added convenience, the front disconnect feature allows easy disconnection of the slide. This makes maintenance, cleaning, and installation hassle-free, ensuring that your storage solutions remain efficient and user-friendly. Wide Drawers: The DS5334EC can accommodate wide drawers up to one meter wide without causing any racking (the movement of the drawer from side to side). Various Mounting Options: The DS63610 bracket accessory kit allows for side and bottom mounting options. However, please note that the DS5334EC telescopic slide is not suitable for flat mounting. Food Safe Grease Option: Customise the telescopic slide with the option of using food-safe grease, making the DS5334EC suitable for environments where hygiene is paramount, such as kitchen applications and food industry. The full extension feature allows for complete access, while the front disconnect feature simplifies the cleaning process. For more information on the product refer to the datasheet and installation guide or contact us directly.

Locking Handle Kit with Red Push Button 120N Force DRHAND-2
description: Secure storage compartments with the DRHAND-2 Locking Handle Kit with red push button DRHAND-2 locking handle kit with a red centrally located push button, suitable for drawers of up to 1.5m wide. The DRHAND-2 locking kit is designed to be used with a slide to lock a drawer or storage compartment in place, once locked in place the user can push the red button to unlock and open the drawer. The lightweight unit is easy to fit and install and has two mounting options to choose from. The front mounting option only includes the lock-in function however the rear mounting option includes lock-in and lock-out. The kit contains: 1 x Handle 1 x Red Push Button 2 x Bar Support Blocks 2 x Lock Blocks 2 x Pins Available product variants: There are four different versions of our locking handle kit, each designed with either a red or yellow push button with a button push force of either 60N or 120N. Products Button Colour Push Force DRHAND-2 Red 120N DBHAND Yellow 120N DRHANL Red 60N DBHANL Yellow 60N Applications The storage system is designed to keep compartments securely locked in place until the push button is activated to open the compartment. The locking handle kit is a popular choice for heavy duty storage compartments, especially in vehicle conversions where it is important that the drawer remains securely locked in place. Due to the corrosion-resistant nature of the product, the locking handle kit is suitable for use in heavy duty outdoor storage, where it is likely that the product would be exposed to the elements. Load rating The load rating will decrease for drawers over 1m wide, for more information please contact the Accuride technical support team. Model Recommended Drawer width mm Up to: 0301 450 DS0330 450 5517-50 450 5417 450 7957 1000 DZ/DS5321 1000 9301-E 1000 DA4120 1000 DA4140 1000 DA4160 1000 DA4162 1000 DA4190 1000 DA4180-080-035 1000 (max 550kg) Mounting Options This product offers two mounting options to suit your specific requirements. Choose between front mounting, which includes the lock-in function, or rear mounting, providing both lock-in and lock-out capabilities. For lock-in and lock-out capabilities please see the accompanying product, the DYHAN4. Which slide can I use this product with? The load rating for the DRHAND-2 locking kit will be dependent on the load rating of the slide it is used with, for example if the DRHAND-2 locking kit is used with our DZ9301 telescopic slide then it will be able to support load ratings of up to 163kg. It is important to note that the locking handle cannot be used with over-extension slides. Installation When installing the product we recommend using an M5 screw. Please see the installation guide for more tips on how to install the DRHAND-2 locking kit.

name: Stainless Steel Full Extension Telescopic Slide DS2330DL
description: The Full Extension Slide DS2330DL - Durable Stainless Steel Slide for Extreme Environments The Full Extension Stainless Steel Slide DS2330DL has been designed for applications subject to corrosion and extreme temperatures. Having been rigorously tested to ten thousand cycles, each pair of stainless steel DS2330DL slides can support a load capacity of up to 15kg. Compact Design for Tight Spaces: With a slide thickness of 19.5mm and a slide height of only 23mm, the compact design of the DS2330DL slide makes it suitable for confined spaces such as small warming drawer compartments or trays beneath fireplaces, optimising functionality without compromising space. Flat Mounting Capability: While suitable for flat mounting, it is important to note that this configuration reduces the load rating by 75%. Applications: Food Safe Environments: Engineered for use in food environments, this slide can withstand extreme temperatures ranging from -80°C to +500°C, making it ideal for food applications subject to both extreme heat and cold environments. To ensure compliance with stringent food safety standards, the DS2330DL telescopic slide has been made using food safe materials. High-Temperature Ovens for Food Preparation: Ideal for harsh environments, this durable stainless steel slide operates seamlessly in temperatures up to +500°C, catering to applications like pizza ovens, stone ovens, steak grills, and charcoal ovens. Industrial Processes: Able to reliably function in industrial processes operating at temperatures up to +500°C, such as heat treatment, coating, and curing applications. Very Low Temperature Applications: Exceptionally versatile, the DS2330DL slide is capable of functioning in temperatures as low as -80°C. Unlike most other slides which use grease that cannot withstand temperatures of below -40 °C or -50 °C, the DS2330DL slide can function in these cold environments, making the DS2330DL slide suitable for use in industrial or laboratory refrigerators. Frequent Cleaning: Safe to use in applications that require frequent cleaning, unlike other slides, where the grease will be washed out over time when cleaning an application with pressurised water. The self-lubricating mechanism of the DS2330DL slide, facilitated by graphite balls, ensures consistent performance even in demanding cleaning processes commonly used in the food and medical industries. For further details, refer to the datasheet or contact us directly and one of our technical experts will be happy to help.
features: Light-duty slide, able to support applications of up to 15kg 100% full extension allows for easy access to the back of the drawer or application Slide thickness of 19.5mm, making the low profile slide suitable for small spaces. High-grade stainless-steel slide suitable for applications subject to corrosion Able to function in temperatures of between -80 °C to +500 °C, making the slide suitable for refrigerators, ovens and high temperature industrial processing applications. Made using food safe materials, ensuring that the slide meets food safety standards

Locking Handle Kit with Red Push Button 60N Force DRHANL-2
description: DRHANL-2 Locking Handle Kit with Red Push Button with a push button force of 60N Introducing the DRHANL-2 Locking Kit, a cutting-edge solution designed for applications which require secure storage compartments. This reliable locking handle kit boasts a centrally located red push button with a push button force of 60N, which makes the DRHANL-2 locking handle kit slightly easier to open compared to the similar DRHAND-2 locking handle kit as the DRHANL-2 requires less force to be applied to the push button. For those with a preference for yellow push buttons, the DRHANL-2 Locking Kit is also available with this option under the product code DBHANL. Precision Engineering The DRHANL-2 Locking Kit combines precision engineering with robust functionality, making it ideal for drawers up to 1.5 meters wide. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, it ensures reliable performance, even in demanding applications. The yellow push button variant (DBHANL-2) offers the same exceptional quality and security. Available Product Variants: Products Button Colour Push Force DRHAND-2 Red 120N DBHAND Yellow 120N DRHANL Red 60N DBHANL Yellow 60N Applications The storage system is designed to keep compartments securely locked in place until the push button is activated to open the compartment. The locking handle kit is a popular choice for heavy duty storage compartments, especially in vehicle conversions where it is important that the drawer remains securely locked in place. Due to the corrosion-resistant nature of the product, the locking handle kit is suitable for use in heavy duty outdoor storage, where it is likely that the product would be exposed to the elements. Effortless Operation Unlocking and accessing your storage compartments has never been more convenient. The DRHANL-2 Locking Kit is designed to effortlessly lock drawers and storage compartments in place. To access your belongings, simply press the push button, and the lock disengages, allowing for easy drawer opening. Mounting Options This product offers two mounting options to suit your specific requirements. Choose between front mounting, which includes the lock-in function, or rear mounting, providing both lock-in and lock-out capabilities. For lock-in and lock-out capabilities please see the accompanying product, the DYHAN4. Comprehensive Kit Contents 1 x Handle 1 x Red Push Button 2 x Bar Support Blocks 2 x Lock Blocks 2 x Pins Applications The DRHANL-2 Locking Kit is engineered to keep compartments securely locked until the push button is engaged for effortless access. It is an excellent choice for heavy-duty storage compartments, particularly in vehicle conversions, where reliable drawer security is paramount. Additionally, its corrosion-resistant design makes it suitable for outdoor applications exposed to the elements. Automotive Production Lines Consider the DRHANL-2 Locking Kit for use in automotive production lines, where component racking and trolleys require secure storage solutions. Its robust construction and dependable locking mechanism ensure that components and tools remain safely stored until needed. Load Rating For drawers wider than 1 meter, the load rating may vary. Please consult our Accuride technical support team for detailed load rating information. Model Recommended Drawer width mm Up to: 0301 450 DS0330 450 5517-50 450 5417 450 7957 1000 DZ/DS5321 1000 9301-E 1000 DA4120 1000 DA4140 1000 DA4160 1000 DA4162 1000 DA4190 1000 DA4180-080-035 1000 (max 550kg) Compatibility The load rating of the DRHANL-2 Locking Kit depends on the accompanying slide. For instance, when used with our DZ9301 telescopic slide, it can support load ratings of up to an impressive 163kg. It is important to note that this locking handle is not compatible with over-extension slides. Installation Guidance For a seamless installation process, we recommend utilizing M5 screws. Refer to the installation guide provided for additional tips and insights on how to effectively install the DRHANL-2 Locking Kit.

name: Light Duty Linear Track System LA1815
description: The LA1815 Light Duty Linear Track System: Precise movement for small machine doors, assembly fixtures and simple XY tables Introducing the LA1815 light duty linear track system, designed for handling loads of up to 8.2kg (static) and up to 3.1kg (dynamic) with precision and durability. The LA1815 linear track system includes an aluminum track, steel plate, and end stops. The linear track system moves with precision, making it ideal for a variety of applications. Industrial Applications From small machine doors and hatches to assembly fixtures that help moving a workpiece during an assembly operation, or covers for bins to guide an operator to use the right items P oka-yoke , the LA1815 linear guide offers smooth and controlled movement, ensuring efficient operation in industrial settings. Small Cabinets The LA1815 linear track is perfect for small cabinet display units like shop counter displays. XY Tables The LA1815 linear slide is designed for use in simple XY tables, providing a sturdy foundation for various positioning tasks. This application is possible due to the ability to flat mount the slide. Retail Counters The LA1815 is also a popular addition for commercial spaces, such as beauty counters in retail environments. This enhances the user experience as the added movement makes it more interactive for the customer as well as making it easier to rearrange the display stand. The LA1815 light duty linear track system brings precise movement to a range of applications, from enhancing productivity on the factory floor to elevating the aesthetics of retail displays. For more information, take a look at the product datasheet or contact us directly.

Soft Close Drawer Slide DZ3832-EC-D
description: Upgrade Your Application with the Improved Soft Close Drawer Slide DZ3832-EC-D Robust Load Capacity and Full Extension The Soft Close Drawer Slide DZ3832-EC-D can handle loads of up to 45 kg, making it perfect for both light and medium-duty applications. With its 100% slide extension feature, you'll have full access to the entire drawer, maximising storage and ease of use. Durable Construction and Compact Design Constructed from mild steel with a bright zinc finish, this drawer slide is designed for strength and durability. The 12.7 mm thickness makes the slide compact enough to fit into small spaces without compromising on your cabinetry's overall design and functionality. DZ3832-EC-D Slide Features The DZ3832-EC-D telescopic slide comes equipped with a soft close mechanism to prevent drawer slamming, enhancing both the lifespan of your drawers and the overall user experience. Additional features include front disconnect for easy removal and cam drawer adjust for precise alignment. Easy Installation and Versatile Use Designed for vertical side mounting only, the DZ3832-EC-D drawer slide is easy to install using M4 screws, 4mm wood screws, or 6mm Euro screws. Please note that it is not suitable for flat mounting. Tested for Reliability This drawer slide has undergone 12 hours of salt spray testing and operates effectively in temperatures ranging from 10 °C to 40 °C, making it a reliable choice for indoor environments. Upgrade your cabinetry with the Soft Close Drawer Slide DZ3832-EC-D. Take a look at the product datasheet or contact us directly for more information.

name: Full Extension Slide with Disconnect DZ4501
description: DZ4501 Full Extension Slide with Disconnect: Maximum Efficiency, Effortless Installation A durable slide with a load capacity of up to 45 kg Experience exceptional durability with the DZ4501 Full Extension Slide with Disconnect. Sold as a pair, the telescopic slides are crafted from high-quality mild steel with a bright zinc finish. Built to withstand the rigors of everyday use, the DZ4501 slide boasts an impressive load capacity of up to 45 kg. Its robust construction ensures long-lasting performance, making it ideal for various applications. The slide is available in lengths ranging from 150 mm to 900 mm, offering versatility for different needs.As a part of our BEE slide range, the slide combines durability and versatility to meet the needs of a wide range of applications. Ultimate Accessibility Enjoy ultimate accessibility with the DZ4501 slide's 100% full extension capability, allowing easy access to your entire drawer, even the items at the very back. Designed to fit seamlessly into compact spaces, it requires just 12.7 mm of side space, optimising storage efficiency. Effortless Installation and Maintenance Effortless installation and maintenance are made possible with the convenient disconnect feature, simplifying both processes. The DZ4501 slide is also equipped with breathing tabs, designed to facilitate straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Rigorously Tested for Reliable Performance The DZ4501 telescopic slide has been rigorously tested for reliable performance. The slide has undergone 12 hours of salt spray testing to withstand harsh environments and operates efficiently in temperatures ranging from -20 °C to 70 °C. Hold-In Feature for Secure Closure The hold-in feature keeps your drawers securely closed, preventing unwanted opening and ensuring stability and safety in various settings. Versatile Applications Across Multiple Industries The DZ4501 Full Extension Slide with Disconnect excels in a wide range of applications across different industries: Interior Design and Home Renovations: Perfect for kitchen and bathroom drawers, the DZ4501 slide enhances accessibility and efficiency in residential settings, optimising storage solutions. Light duty Commercial Settings: In office furniture and hotel receptions, the DZ4501 slide offers durability and ease of use, contributing to organized and functional spaces that cater to professional needs. Light duty industrial applications: In industrial settings such as toolboxes, the DZ4501 slide ensures secure storage and easy access to tools and equipment, enhancing productivity and safety. Upgrade your storage solutions across various industries with the DZ4501 Full Extension Slide with Disconnect. Designed for durability and versatility, it offers reliable performance and effortless installation in diverse applications.
features: Light duty slide, able to support loads of up to 45 kg. Front lever disconnect, for easy installation and maintenance. Breathing tabs for straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under Quality and Warranty policy section.

name: Full Extension Slide with Touch Release DZ4501-TR
description: Introducing the DZ4501-TR Full Extension Slide with Touch Release The DZ4501-TR Full Extension Slide with Touch Release is a premium sliding solution designed for optimal performance and convenience. Constructed from mild steel with a bright zinc finish, this slide is sold as a pair and features a load rating of up to 35 kg. As a part of our BEE slide range, the slide combines durability and versatility to meet the needs of a wide range of applications. Innovative Touch to Release Mechanism One of the standout features of the DZ4501-TR telescopic slide is the touch to release (touch to open/ push to open) mechanism. This eliminates the need for handles, contributing to sleek and modern cabinetry designs. The push to open function offers seamless performance, ensuring that the drawer opens effortlessly with a simple touch. Slide Installation Key features of this slide include a disconnect mechanism that simplifies installation. Additionally, the DZ4501-TR slide is equipped with breathing tabs, designed to facilitate straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Hold-in Feature The hold-in feature guarantees that the drawer remains securely shut, enhancing safety and stability. 100% Extension Feature Engineered to provide 100% full extension, the DZ4501-TR slide ensures easy access to the back of the drawer, making it perfect for a variety of applications. For more information, contact us or download the product datasheet.
features: Light duty slide, able to support loads of up to 35 kg. 100% extension for easy and uninhibited access to the drawer's contents. Front lever disconnect, for easy installation and maintenance. Breathing tabs for straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Push to open/ touch release function offers seamless performance, ensuring that the drawer opens effortlessly with a simple touch. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under quality and warranty policy section.

name: Full Extension Slide with Easy Close DZ4501-EC
description: Full Extension Slide with Easy Close DZ4501-EC: Your Answer to Quiet and Smooth Drawer Operation Introducing the DZ4501-EC Full Extension Slide with Easy Close, designed to provide reliability and durability for various soft close applications. Engineered for 100% full extension, this slide offers easy access to previously unused drawer space, ensuring every inch of your storage is utilised efficiently. Available in slide lengths ranging from 200 mm to 600 mm, the DZ4501-EC caters to a range of applications. As a part of our BEE slide range, the slide combines durability and versatility to meet the needs of a wide range of applications. Easy Close Mechanism: The DZ4501-EC slide features an integrated easy close system (also known as ‘soft close’), eliminating loud slamming and ensuring a quiet, gentle closure. This makes it ideal for delicate equipment and noise-sensitive environments. With a load-bearing capacity of up to 35 kg, this slide guarantees smooth and reliable operation every time. Full Extension Access: Designed with a 100% full extension feature, the DZ4501-EC telescopic slide allows complete access to the entire drawer, making it perfect for storage spaces where reaching the back is important. Easy Installation: The front disconnect feature simplifies installation and maintenance, enabling easy detachment when necessary. Additionally, the slide is also equipped with breathing tabs, further facilitating a hassle-free setup. Durability and Versatility Constructed from mild steel, the DZ4501-EC easy close slide is built to last. It has been rigorously tested to function, ensuring smooth performance in various conditions. Ideal Applications The DZ4501-EC easy close slide is perfect for a wide range of applications, including: Vending Machines: Ensures quiet and smooth operation, enhancing user experience. Retail Storage: Provides secure and gentle closure, protecting delicate items. Under Bed Storage Drawers: Maximises space utilisation with full extension and silent operation. Upgrade your drawer systems with the DZ4501-EC easy close slide. Say goodbye to noisy drawers and welcome a new standard of silent, smooth performance.
features: Light duty slide, able to support loads of up to 35 kg. 100% extension for easy and uninhibited access to the drawer's contents. Front lever disconnect, for easy installation and maintenance. Breathing tabs for straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Easy close mechanism (also called ‘soft close’) eliminates loud slamming and ensuring a quiet, gentle closure. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under quality and warranty policy section.

name: Heavy Duty Telescopic Slide with Disconnect DZ5334
description: The DZ5334 Telescopic Slide: Heavy Duty Zinc-plated Slide Suitable for Wide Retail Drawers The DZ5334 telescopic slide is a high-quality solution designed for smooth and reliable drawer movement in retail and commercial applications. Made from durable zinc-plated mild steel, it offers excellent strength and corrosion resistance. With a 90 kg load rating, it ensures stability and support for wide drawers, while the 100% extension allows full access to stored items. The front disconnect feature simplifies installation and maintenance, making it easy to remove or replace drawers when needed. Retail Applications The DZ5334 is ideal for wide drawers in retail environments, providing smooth operation and durability for high-traffic areas. Its front disconnect feature is particularly beneficial in retail cabinetry, allowing for quick assembly and easy access for LED light installation. This simplifies the setup process, reducing downtime and making maintenance hassle-free. Designed for efficiency, the DZ5334 ensures long-lasting performance in demanding retail spaces.
features: Front disconnect Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under quality and warranty policy section.

name: Stainless Steel Full Extension Super Heavy Duty Slide DS4180-080-035-U
description: Product Overview The heavy-duty telescopic slide is a premium solution designed for applications requiring exceptional load-bearing capacity and reliability. Crafted entirely from stainless steel, it offers unparalleled durability and corrosion resistance, making it suitable for use in demanding environments. With a load rating of up to 825 kg per pair, the slide is engineered for strength without compromising performance. The slide provides 100% extension, allowing full access to the drawer or platform it supports, with a maximum deflection of just 1% at the rated load. For optimal performance, the slide should be mounted vertically; flat mounting is not recommended as it reduces the load rating by 81%. The slide supports drawer widths of up to 3,000 mm, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of designs and requirements. It operates effectively across a broad temperature range of -20 °C to 300 °C, making it suitable for diverse environments, from refrigerated storage to high-heat industrial settings. Its permitted mounting orientations include vertical and flat mounts, though vertical mounting is strongly advised for maximum capacity. Engineered with precision, this telescopic slide delivers exceptionally smooth movement and reliable operation in the most challenging conditions, ensuring long-term performance and minimal maintenance. Its robust stainless steel construction ensures resistance to wear, impact, and harsh conditions, making it a highly versatile choice. Applications This telescopic slide is designed to meet the rigorous demands of specialized industries where performance, durability, and hygiene are critical: Medical Applications: The stainless steel construction and smooth operation make this slide ideal for medical environments, where reliability and cleanability are paramount. It is suitable for use in medical equipment, diagnostic devices, and storage solutions that require robust yet precise mechanisms. Pharmaceutical Manufacturing: The slide’s corrosion-resistant design and high load capacity make it a perfect choice for pharmaceutical manufacturing environments. It ensures smooth and reliable operation in cleanrooms or production lines, maintaining efficiency and compliance with stringent industry standards. Marine Applications: Designed to withstand harsh environments, this slide excels in marine settings, offering corrosion resistance in saltwater conditions. It is ideal for use in shipbuilding, offshore platforms, and storage systems exposed to the elements. Military Applications: Built for extreme durability, the slide is well-suited for military use, including vehicle storage solutions, rugged equipment mounts, and other demanding applications where reliability and performance are critical under tough conditions. This telescopic slide is a versatile, heavy-duty solution for industries requiring robust, high-performance sliding mechanisms. With its combination of strength, smoothness, and resilience, it delivers exceptional results in the most challenging environments.
features: I-beam intermediate member for extra strength Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under quality and warranty policy section.

name: Full Extension Telescopic Slide with Lock-in Hold-out DZ5306DO
description: The DZ5306DO Redefines Strength and Precision Experience the perfect blend of strength and precision with the DZ5306DO telescopic slide, a robust and versatile solution crafted for the most demanding industrial and heavy-duty applications. Engineered for smooth performance and long-lasting durability, this slide offers full-extension functionality, providing complete access to drawers and compartments. Its advanced design makes it ideal for environments where precision, strength, and stability are crucial. Enhanced Safety with Dual Locking Features This model is equipped with dual locking capabilities to enhance both safety and convenience. A hold-out feature keeps the slide securely open, maintaining a stable position during use to prevent unintended closure. Additionally, the lever-operated Lock-In mechanism holds the slide firmly shut when needed, providing stability during transport or heavy-duty operations. The intuitive lever design offers effortless control for reliable engagement and release. High Load Capacity and Robust Performance The DZ5306DO slide is built to handle substantial loads, supporting up to 120kg per pair. This heavy-duty capacity ensures dependable strength for demanding applications. Designed to operate reliably across a wide temperature range from -30°C to 70°C, it performs consistently even in demanding environments. Compact Dimensions and Durable Surface Finish With a thickness of 19.1mm and a height of 53.1mm, the slide combines a compact profile with robust strength. With a length range of 300mm to 790mm, this slide provides versatile sizing to accommodate a range of applications. Constructed from high-quality mild steel with a bright zinc finish, it offers excellent protection against wear and rust. Common Applications and Versatility Discover the versatility of the DZ5306DO in a range of industries: Van racking systems: Enhances vehicle organization by securing tools and heavy equipment. The slide’s reliable locking mechanisms keep drawers in place during transit, boosting safety while allowing easy access to contents when stationary. Industrial storage: Improves efficiency in tool compartments, display cabinets, and compact warehouses with full-extension access and robust performance. Emergency service vehicles: Enhances safety and quick access for essential tools and equipment, keeping drawers securely locked during transport and easily accessible in critical moments. Take control of your storage with the DZ5306DO full-extension slide. Enjoy smooth operation, reliable locking and high load capacity—all in one durable design. For detailed dimensions and additional information, refer to the product's datasheet or reach out to us directly for personalized assistance.

description: DZ5334EC Easy-Close Telescopic Slide - Precision-engineered for smooth, quiet, and reliable movement The Accuride DZ5334-EC is a high-performance telescopic slide designed to deliver a premium user experience in both commercial and residential drawer applications. Featuring integrated Easy-Close functionality, this slide ensures drawers close smoothly and silently, enhancing both convenience and durability. With a load rating of up to 90 kg per pair and 100% extension, the DZ5334EC is ideal for wider drawers — up to 1,000 mm — and offers full access to stored contents. Its compact 19.1 mm slide thickness allows for easy installation in space-conscious environments, while the front disconnect feature simplifies maintenance and installation. Reliability and Performance The DZ5334-EC guarantees smooth and reliable movement. It has been validated to 80,000 cycles at rated load (depending on the slide length). Whether in commercial settings or residential spaces, rest assured that this slide can handle the demands of your storage requirements. The DZ5334-EC is a versatile slide designed to meet the needs of a wide range of environments. Whether in high-traffic commercial settings or demanding residential installations, it provides dependable performance with minimal maintenance. Typical applications include: Shopfitting – Ideal for retail displays, drawers, and cabinetry where reliable extension and soft-close functionality are key to user experience. Especially in applications where the visitors of the shop operate the drawers, reliability and robustness, also against misuse, are key for avoiding issues in the field. Kitchens and Utility Rooms – Supports heavy drawers storing cookware, utensils, or cleaning supplies. Offices and Workspaces – Perfect for filing cabinets, under-desk storage, and sliding work surfaces. Tool Storage and Workshops – With its high cycle rating, it’s well-suited for tool chests, technician drawers, and mobile workstations. Medical and Laboratory Equipment – Provides smooth and durable motion for storage units requiring precision and reliability. Caravans and Motorhomes – Compact yet robust, ideal for maximizing storage in mobile and compact environments. Wherever consistent performance and durability are required, the DZ5334-EC delivers. Easy Access with Full Extension: The full extension feature allows the user to reach the back of drawers or compartments effortlessly, enhancing convenience and practicality in your storage solutions. Soft Close Feature: The DZ5334-EC is designed for a smooth user experience, featuring a soft-close mechanism for the last 45 mm of the closing cycle. Enjoy smooth and quiet closure, minimizing noise and preventing abrupt slamming. The DZ5334-EC slide is one of the few slides with a soft close feature which can function in temperatures as low as 0°C, making this slide ideal for applications like refrigerated storage or cold rooms. Front Disconnect Feature: For added convenience, the front disconnect feature allows easy disconnection of the slide. This makes maintenance, cleaning, and installation of the drawer hassle-free, ensuring that your storage solutions remain efficient and user-friendly. Wide Drawers: The DZ5334-EC can accommodate wide drawers up to one meter wide with minimized racking. We recommend that a centrally positioned handle is used on wide drawers. Various Mounting Options: The DZ635xx bracket accessory kit allows for side and bottom mounting options. However, please note that the DZ5334-EC telescopic slide itself is not suitable for flat mounting.

name: Soft Close Drawer Slide DB3832-EC-D
description: The DB3832-EC-D Black Finish EasyClose Slide: Ideal for Office, Kitchen, and Retail Use The DB3832-EC-D is a black zinc finish light-duty drawer slide engineered for enhanced strength and smooth, reliable motion. Designed with a load capacity of up to 45 kg per pair and full 100% extension, it features a front lever disconnect mechanism for easy installation and maintenance. Its compact 12.7 mm slide thickness (14 mm with mounting bracket) allows for easy installation in cabinet hardware applications, while the front disconnect feature simplifies its maintenance. Reliability and Performance: The silent operation of the DB3832-EC-D ensures smooth, quiet sliding, ideal for noise-sensitive environments. For added versatility, an optional clip-on bracket is available to support both bottom and platform mounting configurations of the slide. Typical applications include: Offices and Workspaces - With its high cycle rating of 80,000, it’s well-suited for a wide variety of pull-out shelves, e.g. filing cabinets, under-desk storage, and sliding work surfaces. Kitchens and Utility Rooms – Offers durable, smooth motion, making it perfect for residential applications, and a sleek black finish to match dark cabinetry such as utensil drawers, cookware storage, or cleaning supply cabinets. Point-of-Sale Trays – A great solution for retail cabinetry where reliable extension, a sleek look, and soft-close functionality are key to user experience. Black Zinc Finish The DB3832-EC-D is a sleek black version of the 3800 series slide with easy close. This new finish offers a modern look with enhanced design versatility - perfect for matching dark cabinetry, high-end retail fixtures, or contemporary office furniture. With the same trusted performance and features as the standard model, the black version combines aesthetic appeal with quiet, reliable functionality. Hold-In Detent: The EasyClose Mechanism also acts like a hold-in detent and prevents roll-out and/or bounce back in closed position. Soft Close Feature: The DB3832-EC-D is designed for a smooth user experience, featuring a soft-close mechanism. Enjoy smooth and quiet closure, minimising noise and preventing abrupt slamming. Front Disconnect Feature: For added convenience, the front-disconnect functionality makes drawer removal and reinsertion quick and easy, simplifying installation, maintenance, and cleaning tasks. Cam Drawer Adjust: Our Cam Drawer Adjust feature allows for up to 3.2 mm of vertical adjustment, ensuring a perfect fit and smooth operation.
features: Front disconnect Cam adjustment 3.2 mm in height direction EasyClose to ensure soft, silent closure of the slide and prevent rolling out Breathing tabs to compensate variations in cabinet or drawer width Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under quality and warranty policy section.

Drawer Locking Handle Kit with Push Buttons DBHAND
description: Locking Handle Kit With Push Button DBHAND Elevate the reliability of your storage solutions with the DBHAND Locking Handle Kit, engineered for robust and secure closure. Our locking handle kit features distinctive push buttons. The push force can be configured to 60 N or 120 N. The locking handle kit is designed to ensure your storage compartments remain securely closed until pressure is applied to the push button. Reliable Closure The DBHAND Locking Handle Kit ensures that the storage compartment remains firmly closed, making it especially well-suited to applications like vehicle storage, where the application could be subject to movement during transit. It is designed and engineered for use with drawers and compartments up to 1.5 meters wide, preventing unintentional opening during transit or other dynamic scenarios. Lock-in & Lock-out Options Lock-in Option: The Kit contains everything to use DBHAND as a Lock-in mechanism. Use the following components for the lock-in configuration: Pre-assembled lock mechanism: 1 x handle 1 x mechanism with 2 springs 3 x push button threaded with different colours: Red, Yellow and Black 2 x shaft blocks to support the locking bars 2 x zinc-plated mild steel rods with 750 mm length per rod, which can be cut to the required length to match the actual drawer width 2 x lock blocks for mounting to the cabinet 2 x pins Lock-out Option: The Kit also contains everything to use DBHAND as a lock-in and lock-out mechanism: Pre-assembled lock mechanism: 1 x handle 1 x mechanism with 2 springs 3 x push button threaded with different colors: Red, Yellow, and Black 1 x yellow non-threaded button 3 x shaft blocks to support the locking bars and the lock-out bar 2 x pins 2 x zinc-plated mild steel rods with 750 mm length per rod, can be cut to the required length to match the actual drawer width 4 lock blocks Notes: Lock-out cannot be used on over-extension (100%+) slides. User must provide a 10 mm rod with M10 threads over 25 mm in length at each end to connect the push-buttons for lock-out according to the depth of the drawer. To reduce the push force for unlocking the drawer from 120 N to 60 N, the user can dismount one spring from the locking mechanism. Optional stainless steel Locking Bars 2 x Stainless Steel Locking Bars DSHAN3 can be ordered in addition to enhance the corrosion resistance of the mechanism Precision Engineering Built with precision engineering, the DBHAND Locking Handle Kit ensures dependable performance, even in demanding applications. Your assets remain securely contained, eliminating concerns about drawer or compartment movement. Effortless Operation Unlocking and accessing your storage compartments is a breeze with the DBHAND Locking Kit. The centrally located push button ensures quick and convenient access. Versatile Installation This product offers two mounting options to suit your specific requirements. For lock-in, it is sufficient to mount the mechanism to the drawer or compartment front only. For lockin and lock-out, only mount the handle with the button at the front and the locking mechanism at the back of the drawer. Comprehensive Kit Contents Locking Handle Kit package includes all the essential components: Locking mechanism with two springs Push button force of 60N with one spring mounted Push button force of 120N with 2 x spring mounted 2 x Mild steel zinc plated locking bars with a length of 750 mm per bar 1 x yellow button with thread 1 x yellow button without thread 1 x black button with thread 1 x red button with thread 1 x Black Handle Locking Mechanism 2 x Pins 4 x Lock Blocks 3 x Shaft Block Applications The DBHAND Locking Handle Kit is the ultimate solution for ensuring that drawers and storage compartments remain securely closed during transit or when needed. It is particularly valuable in vehicle conversions and applications where controlling drawer or compartment movement is crucial. Its corrosion-resistant design makes it suitable for outdoor usage, even when exposed to the elements. Load Rating The load rating of a drawer with DBHAND is determined by the load rating of the slide itself, which is not increased or decreased by using DBHAND. Please note that this locking handle is not compatible with over-extension slides. Compatibility The load rating of the DBHAND Locking Handle Kit depends on the accompanying slide. When paired with our DA4160 aluminum heavy duty telescopic slide for example, it effortlessly supports load ratings of up to an impressive 300 kg. Please note that this locking handle is not compatible with over-extension slides. Installation Guidance For a seamless installation experience, we recommend using M5 screws. Refer to the product installation guide for guidance on how to effectively install the DBHAND Locking Handle Kit.

name: Black Full Extension Slide with Easy Close DB4501-EC
description: Full Extension Slide with Easy Close DB4501-EC Introducing the DB4501-EC Full Extension Slide with Easy Close, designed to provide reliability and durability for various soft close applications. Engineered for 100% full extension, this slide offers easy access to previously unused drawer space, ensuring every inch of your storage is utilised efficiently. Available in slide lengths ranging from 200 mm to 600 mm, the DB4501-EC caters to a range of applications. Easy Close Mechanism: The DB4501-EC slide features an integrated easy close system, eliminating loud slamming and ensuring a quiet, gentle closure. This makes it ideal for noise-sensitive environments. Full Extension : Designed with a 100% full extension feature, the DB4501-EC telescopic slide allows complete access to the entire drawer, making it perfect for storage spaces where reaching the back is important. Easy Installation: The front disconnect feature simplifies installation and maintenance, enabling easy detachment when necessary. Black Zinc Finish The DB4501-EC is a sleek black version of the 4501 series slide with easy close. This new finish offers a modern look with enhanced design versatility. With the same trusted performance and features as the standard model, the black version combines aesthetic appeal with quiet, reliable functionality. Ideal Applications The DB4501-EC easy close slide is perfect for a wide range of applications, including: Vending Machines: Ensures quiet and smooth operation. Retail Storage: Provides secure and gentle closure, protecting delicate items. Under Bed Storage Drawers: Maximises space utilisation with full extension and silent operation.
features: Front lever disconnect for easy installation and maintenance. Breathing tabs for straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Easy close mechanism (also called ‘soft close’) eliminates loud slamming and ensuring a quiet, gentle closure. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under quality and warranty policy section.

name: Stainless Steel Full Extension Slide with Disconnect DS4501
description: The Stainless Steel Full Extension Slide with Disconnect DS4501 has been designed with a slim profile of 12.7mm thickness. It has a load rating of up to 45 kg and offers 100% full extension. The slide features a front disconnect lever for easy installation and maintenance, with a hold-in feature to keep the draw secure when closed. Ideal for light-duty furniture, cabinet hardware and commercial settings.
features: Hold-in feature to ensure the drawer stays closed until an additional force is applied. Front lever disconnect for easy installation and maintenance. Breathing tabs for straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under the Quality and Warranty policy section.

name: Black Full Extension Slide with Touch Release DB4501-TR
description: The DB4501-TR Full Extension Slide with Touch Release The DB4501-TR Full Extension Slide with Touch Release is a premium sliding solution designed for optimal performance and convenience. Constructed from mild steel, this slide has a sleek black zinc finish. Innovative Touch to Release Mechanism One of the standout features of the DB4501-TR telescopic slide is the touch-to-release (touch to open/ push to open) mechanism. This eliminates the need for handles, contributing to sleek and modern cabinetry designs, ensuring that the drawer opens effortlessly with a simple touch. Black Zinc Finish The DB4501-TR is a sleek black version of the 4501 series slide with touch release. This new finish offers a modern look with enhanced design versatility. With the same trusted performance and features as the standard model, the black version combines aesthetic appeal with quiet, reliable functionality. Slide Installation Key features of this slide include a disconnect mechanism that simplifies installation. Additionally, the DB4501-TR slide is equipped with breathing tabs, designed to facilitate straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Hold-in Feature The hold-in feature guarantees that the drawer remains securely shut, enhancing safety and stability. 100% Extension Feature Engineered to provide 100% full extension, the DB4501-TR slide ensures easy access to the back of the drawer, making it perfect for a variety of applications.
features: Front lever disconnect for easy installation and maintenance. Breathing tabs for straightforward installation, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Hold-in feature to ensure the drawer stays closed until an additional force is applied. Push to open/touch release function offers seamless performance, ensuring that the drawer opens effortlessly with a simple touch. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under the quality and warranty policy section.

name: Full Extension Slide with Bayonet Fixings DZ4505
description: The light-duty slide DZ4505 with a slim profile of 17.5 mm thickness, is designed for furniture cabinet hardware. It features bayonet fixings, supports up to 35 kg load capacity, and offers 100% full extension. The slide includes a front disconnect lever for easy drawer removal and a hold-in feature to keep the drawer securely closed.
features: Hold-in feature to ensure the drawer stays closed until an additional force is applied. Bayonet fixings. Front lever disconnect for easy installation and maintenance. Accuride International Limited guarantees its “Quick Ship”™ slides against defects in material and workmanship. Please read more under the Quality and Warranty policy section.
